summary: Represents a constant‑head boundary package for MODFLOW‑6 models, storing prescribed head values (and optional solute concentrations) for selected cells and handling their activation, deactivation, and interaction with output control and transport modules.
business_intent: Enable modelers to define, validate, and manage constant‑head cells in groundwater flow simulations, supporting time‑varying heads, repeat stress periods, and optional concentration handling while providing options for printing and saving flow information.
